trait.name: Sand Camouflage
text: The giant has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in sandy terrain.

trait.name: Wasteland Stride
text: The giant ignores difficult terrain caused by sand, gravel, or rocks.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The giant makes two falchion attacks.

action.name: Falchion
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 23 (6d4 + 8) slashing damage.

action.name: Rock
text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. Hit: 30 (4d10 + 8) bludgeoning damage.
